about_the_game:
Take a tour of history and culture! The Art & History Museum for RPG Maker has tons of tiles to build a wide variety of exhibits, from ancient dinosaur skeletons to modern art!

The Art & History Museum Tileset Includes:

Ground tiles:

Plain textured floor in 3 neutral palettes (plus black)
3 matching diamond tile floors
grate
floor stripes
2 types of cordons/barriers
4 table/display styles

Walls/roofs:

Walls to match floors, plus a white wall.

Also includes:

Spotlights
Display cases (empty and filled…includes layered PSD so you can place your own objects inside)
Screens, lit and unlit…use as a base for presentations or other animations, or just use as a backdrop for items you want to be noticed!
Utility tiles…stairs, ladder, grates, exit signs, clock, fire alarm, etc
Decorative planters
Seating in neutral colors
Signs in various styles – includes signs with text, screens, and a blank version you can customize if you wish
Registers and ticket sales signs
70+ paintings in various styles
Statues and art objects in various styles – Jeweled objects, obelisk, modern art pieces, Greek-style statues, busts and more
History and culture tiles – see screenshots
Dinosaur exhibit with 4 large skeletons (t-rex, stegosaurus, triceratops and raptor), fossils, eggs, mini dinos, sabertooth cat, mammoth
Air and space exhibit with models of a jet plane, rocket, Apollo 11 command, biplane, Wright flyer, space shuttle, Lilenthal glider, Vostok, spacesuit, lunar lander and more!

Events and Animations

Door animations
Elevator
Escalators
Fountain water animation
Turnstiles


UPDATE January 2025:

* Art updates, minor bugfixes


Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
